description.value:
Frequency once per day

You summon an aura of shimmering heat.

For 1 minute, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed]{Concealment} against creatures more than 5 feet away, and any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you suffers @Damage[1d12[fire]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).

At @Damage[2d12[fire]]{13th} and @Damage[3d12[fire]]{17th} level, this damage increases by 1d12.
